title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button does not populate the 'Enclosing Type' field. Instead, the field remains blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor when a .java file is open.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor using build 20011106.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard. It should be blank, but it should default to the current type in the editor.
